actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-220.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 346 - 51 (Record Vote No: 184).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1590) to provide emergency food assistance to low-income and unemployed persons and to improve the commodity distribution program.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. R. 1590 (emergency food assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1590) to provide emergency food assistance to low-income and unemployed persons and to improve the commodity distribution program.
